description: Play Silicon Tally to find out how well you've kept up on this week's tech news.
title: What isn't available on Amazon Prime: Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week we're joined by tech reporter for the New York Times, Farhad Manjoo.
teaser: Play Silicon Tally to find out how well you've kept up on this week's tech news.
